name: Traffic
description:
Traffic is a full-service digital marketing consultancy with over 100 full-time staff based in four offices. The company provides integrated and professional online business solutions designed to help clients grow through innovation and creativity; whether driven through web, social, content, mobile, search or advertising channels. The team are experienced technologists and marketers who have worked globally for some of the biggest network agencies on some of the world’s biggest brands.
 
READ MORE...
